${ModID}:StanceDance.NAME: Stance Dance
${ModID}:StanceDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enter a random Stance. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:StanceDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enter a random Stance.

${ModID}:RagnarokNRoll.NAME: Ragnarok 'n Roll
${ModID}:RagnarokNRoll.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Exit your Stance.

${ModID}:Swagger.NAME: Swagger
${ModID}:Swagger.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn in a Stance, gain !M! Strength and Dexterity.
${ModID}:Swagger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If you end your turn in a Stance, gain !M! Strength and Dexterity.

${ModID}:MoodSwing.NAME: Mood Swing
${ModID}:MoodSwing.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 2 cards. NL If you are in *Angry, enter Calm. Otherwise, enter ${ModID}:Angry.
